name: Parmesan Artichoke Casserole
description: This is a great casserole that is quick and cheesy! You can add other veggies for a summery twist - sliced zucchini or chopped spinach work great!
ingredients: 2 (10 ounce) cans artichoke hearts in water, drained #8 ounces grated Parmesan cheese #2 teaspoons garlic powder #½ cup mayonnaise #2 tablespoons dried parsley #1 pinch paprika

name: Killer Potato Casserole
description: These killer potatoes are great with meatloaf or as an accompaniment with anything! They are killer because of their delicious combination of potatoes, soup, sour cream and cheese.
ingredients: 1 (32 ounce) package frozen potatoes au gratin #1 (16 ounce) container sour cream #4 cups shredded Cheddar cheese #2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of chicken soup #4 cups crushed cornflakes cereal

name: Quick Fried Rice
description: Fast and easy bacon fried rice.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen mixed vegetables #2 eggs #4 cups cooked white rice #6 slices bacon #½ cup snow peas #2 carrots, diced #2 tablespoons soy sauce #½ teaspoon salt

name: Andrew's Herb Risotto
description: Risotto can stand in for potatoes or noodles as side-dish and is microwave reheatable. Great accompaniment with spring asparagus. The herbs and spices in this recipe are optional, so 'customize' it to suit your tastes!
ingredients: 3 tablespoons canola oil #3 tablespoons butter #1 cup trimmed, diced fennel bulb #1 red bell pepper, diced #1 yellow onion, diced #3 cloves garlic, minced #3 tablespoons chopped fresh mint, divided #3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, divided #2 tablespoons chopped fresh rosemary, divided #2 teaspoons grated lemon zest, divided #½ teaspoon ground coriander #1 ½ cups uncooked Arborio rice #½ cup dry white wine #3 ½ cups chicken stock # salt and pepper to taste #1 ½ tablespoons fresh lemon juice #⅓ cup grated Parmesan cheese

name: Oven Fried Potatoes I
description: Crispy, rich red potatoes roasted with onion and bacon. These are really yummy, and great with steak...don't skimp on the butter.
ingredients: 5 pounds red potatoes, thinly sliced #1 onion, finely chopped #6 slices bacon, chopped #½ cup butter, diced # salt and pepper to taste

name: Awesome and Easy Creamy Corn Casserole
description: This truly is the most delicious stuff! A bit like a cross between corn souffle and a slightly sweet corn pudding! Try it, I know you will love the ease of preparation and especially the taste. Everyone always wants the recipe! Note: The ingredients can be doubled and baked in a 9x13 inch baking dish in almost the same amount of cooking time.
ingredients: ½ cup butter, melted #2 eggs, beaten #1 (8.5 ounce) package dry corn bread mix #1 (15 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained #1 (14.75 ounce) can creamed corn #1 cup sour cream

name: Mexican Corn
description: This recipe was given to me by my aunt in Texas, where they like everything hot! Now, my family wants it for holidays, barbeques, or just by itself.
ingredients: 2 (15.25 ounce) cans whole kernel corn, drained #1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese #¼ cup butter #10 jalapeno peppers, chopped #1 teaspoon garlic salt

name: Vegetable Medley
description: A vegetable medley that is soooo good!
ingredients: ¼ cup olive oil #2 large sweet potatoes, sliced #4 red potatoes, cubed #1 large onion, sliced into rings #1 teaspoon minced garlic #2 green bell peppers, sliced #2 red bell peppers, sliced #2 carrots, shredded #¼ cup Italian-style seasoning

name: Smothered Potatoes
description: I usually make these with salmon patties and biscuits. You can use it with almost anything.
ingredients: 5 red potatoes, peeled and cubed # salt and pepper to taste #¾ cup all-purpose flour for coating #½ small onion, diced #2 tablespoons vegetable oil #3 tablespoons water

name: Honey Glazed Carrots
description: This recipe is sweet but full of flavor and spice...Goes great with pot roast or oven baked chicken...Yum Yum
ingredients: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil #1 pound baby carrots #½ onion, chopped #2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce #1 teaspoon dried oregano #1 teaspoon monosodium glutamate (MSG) #2 teaspoons garlic powder # salt and pepper to taste #3 tablespoons honey #3 tablespoons butter, softened

name: Mixed Vegetable Casserole
description: Vegetables in a creamy, cheesy sauce. Everyone wants the recipe after they have tried it!
ingredients: 2 (15 ounce) cans mixed vegetables, drained #1 small onion, diced #1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup #1 cup mayonnaise #1 cup shredded white Cheddar cheese #36 buttery round crackers, crushed

name: Slow Cooker Sweet Potato Casserole
description: This recipe is very easy to make and very yummy! Goes great with any chicken or turkey dish!
ingredients: 2 (29 ounce) cans sweet potatoes, drained and mashed #⅓ cup butter, melted #2 tablespoons white sugar #2 tablespoons brown sugar #1 tablespoon orange juice #2 eggs, beaten #½ cup milk #⅓ cup chopped pecans #⅓ cup brown sugar #2 tablespoons all-purpose flour #2 teaspoons butter, melted

name: Red Beans
description: Beans with pure Latin flavor. Accented with potatoes, pumpkin, ham, garlic, and cilantro, this side dish could steal the show!
ingredients: 1 small onion, chopped #1 small green bell pepper, chopped #2 cloves garlic, chopped #1 tablespoon fresh cilantro leaves #1 teaspoon annatto or achiote powder #1 tablespoon olive oil #½ cup diced ham #1 (16.5 ounce) can red beans, drained #1 cup peeled and diced potatoes #½ cup peeled and diced pumpkin #1 cup water #1 teaspoon salt

name: Hal's Wine Mustard
description: A simple recipe for extraordinary homemade white wine mustard.
ingredients: ¾ cup white sugar #¾ cup ground dry mustard #½ cup distilled white vinegar #½ cup dry white wine #3 eggs, beaten

name: Escabeche
description: This is an old Spanish recipe for zesty marinated vegetables that can be prepared with fish, poultry, or even with sliced up cooked green bananas. I like it best with chicken gizzards.
ingredients: 2 pounds chicken gizzards #1 large onion, diced #1 large green bell pepper, diced #1 medium head garlic, chopped #1 ½ cups white wine vinegar #1 cup corn oil #3 bay leaves #2 tablespoons black peppercorns #½ cup pimento-stuffed green olives # salt to taste

name: Absolute Stress
description: One is enough to relieve most stress levels!
ingredients: 1 fluid ounce vodka #1 fluid ounce dark rum #1 fluid ounce peach schnapps #1 fluid ounce orange juice #1 fluid ounce cranberry juice

name: Amaretto Smoothie
description: The ice cream masks the liquor flavor in this delicious creamy concoction.
ingredients: 4 (1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers amaretto liqueur #4 (1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers milk #1 cup vanilla ice cream

name: Awesome Apple Martinis
description: This is a wonderful libation for summertime, or year round.
ingredients: 1 fluid ounce apple schnapps #1 fluid ounce vodka #1 fluid ounce apple juice

name: Bahama Mama I
description: Refreshing alcoholic drink with rum and tropical flavors. Maybe you can't be in the Bahamas, but at least you can pretend with one of these!
ingredients: ¼ fluid ounce coffee-flavored liqueur #½ fluid ounce dark rum #½ fluid ounce coconut liqueur #¼ fluid ounce 151 proof rum #½ lemon, juiced #4 fluid ounces pineapple juice #1 maraschino cherry

name: Banana Blast II
description: This banana smoothie is a very nice drink on a nice summer day.
ingredients: 2 bananas #1 cup milk #¼ cup water #2 tablespoons brown sugar #8 cubes ice

name: Big Apple Martini
description: I discovered this recipe on the Upper West Side at a swanky bar. This will be the new 'in' drink! A Lady apple makes a great garnish if you can find one.
ingredients: 1 cup crushed ice #6 fluid ounces vodka #1 fluid ounce apple jack #1 dash Calvados

name: Blue Sky Martini
description: A vodka martini with vermouth and a splash of blue curacao. Looks cool in a martini glass.
ingredients: 1 fluid ounce vodka #¼ fluid ounce sweet vermouth #¼ fluid ounce Blue Curacao #3 stuffed green olives

name: Bourbolicious
description: This great recipe for Bourbon slush is originally from my friend's Kentucky cousins, and was renamed at a recent dinner party. It is especially good made with citrus herbal tea!
ingredients: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed #1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate #1 cup white sugar #1 ½ cups bourbon whiskey #2 ¼ cups brewed tea #6 cups water

name: Cappuccino in a Jar
description: Cappuccino mix that can be placed in a jar. It makes a great gift to go along with cookies in a jar! It could also be used in a fundraiser.
ingredients: ⅔ cup instant coffee granules #1 cup powdered non-dairy creamer #1 cup powdered chocolate drink mix #½ cup white sugar #¾ teaspoon ground cinnamon #⅜ teaspoon ground nutmeg

name: Casa Marina
description: This is a delicious cocktail which tastes just like summer in a glass! Its also pretty lethal because it tastes so innocently alcohol free! You can make up a big bowl of it by just chucking a bottle of each spirit and a carton of each juice into a punch bowl. Adding a bottle of sparkling wine gives it some fizz u002du002d and an extra kick!
ingredients: 1 fluid ounce melon liqueur #1 fluid ounce peach schnapps #1 fluid ounce coconut flavored rum #2 fluid ounces white rum #3 ⅔ fluid ounces orange juice #3 ⅔ fluid ounces cranberry juice #2 twists lime zest, garnish

name: Chocolate Buzz Milkshake
description: A chocolate espresso milkshake!
ingredients: 1 cup milk #5 cubes ice #1 fluid ounce espresso coffee #¾ cup chocolate ice cream #2 teaspoons instant hot chocolate mix #2 tablespoons chocolate syrup

name: Diamond
description: This is an alcoholic drink I enjoyed at the Oriental Hotel in Bangkok during my honeymoon. It's made with rum and banana liqueur.
ingredients: 2 fluid ounces white rum #¼ fluid ounce dry vermouth #¼ fluid ounce banana liqueur

name: Chocolate Strawberry Banana Milkshake
description: A wonderful milkshake that can easily be adapted for low-sugar diets. My mother got me started on this 20 years ago. I rarely add sugar or sweetener, but I realize that some people enjoy a bit more sweetness. You can substitute orange juice for milk if you like.
ingredients: 1 cup low-fat milk #½ cup frozen unsweetened strawberries #½ ripe banana #2 tablespoons powdered chocolate drink mix #½ teaspoon vanilla extract #2 teaspoons white sugar

name: Chocolate Strawberry Smoothie
description: This strawberry, banana chocolate yogurt shake makes a wonderful treat for any occasion.
ingredients: 2 bananas, frozen and chunked #½ cup frozen strawberries #2 tablespoons chocolate syrup #1 cup plain yogurt

name: Orange Cream Drink
description: This is a great easy recipe which could be a delicious refresher or a breakfast meal!
ingredients: 1 cup orange juice #½ cup apple juice #3 tablespoons honey #½ teaspoon vanilla extract #2 tablespoons nonfat dry milk powder #1 banana, sliced #2 cubes ice

name: Colorful Beverage
description: Want to impress your friends? Try this colorful drink that has as much color in it as flavor! Not only does this look fun, it gets even better when the ice cubes melt! Try it also with strawberry, cherry or grape juice.
ingredients: 1 (64 fluid ounce) bottle orange juice #1 (64 fluid ounce) bottle cranberry juice

name: Dana's Tropical Fruit Smoothie
description: A favorite summertime breakfast of ours. Fruity and refreshing, and low fat!!
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can crushed pineapple with juice #1 cup plain yogurt #1 banana #8 cubes ice #1 cup orange juice

name: Cubacrany
description: This is a refreshing summer drink you can enjoy all year long. My husband and I love to have one every day after working out at the gym! Be sure to use fresh lemon juice!
ingredients: 4 fluid ounces Puerto Rican white rum #½ lemon, juiced #6 fluid ounces cranberry juice #4 cubes ice

name: Easy Punch
description: I served this at my grandmother's 90th birthday and everyone wanted the recipe. Use any flavor of drink mix. One variation is to freeze the punch overnight and then set it out an hour before the event.
ingredients: 4 (0.13 ounce) packages unsweetened strawberry-flavored drink mix powder #2 (46 fluid ounce) cans pineapple juice #3 cups white sugar #4 quarts water #2 liters ginger ale

name: Gene's Long Island Iced Tea
description: Be careful with this one. For the un-initiated, this drink tastes great and will creep up on you before you know it.
ingredients: 1 fluid ounce vodka #1 fluid ounce gin #1 fluid ounce triple sec liqueur #1 fluid ounce rum #1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle cola-flavored carbonated beverage

name: Ginger Lemonade
description: What a great twist on lemonade. Freeze some of this into ice cubes to use in the drinks, so it won't be diluted!
ingredients: 3 cups white sugar #4 quarts water #14 slices fresh ginger root #4 cups fresh lemon juice #2 lemons, sliced

name: Godfather
description: This is a pre-dinner drink is also popular as a nightcap. The almond flavor of Amaretto softens the bite of the scotch. A wonderful night summer Australian drink!
ingredients: 1 fluid ounce Scotch whiskey #1 fluid ounce amaretto liqueur

name: Grandmother's Punch
description: My Grandmother found this recipe and makes it every year at Christmas. It is a family favorite, and kids love it.
ingredients: 2 (0.13 ounce) packages unsweetened strawberry-flavored drink mix powder #2 ½ cups white sugar #4 quarts cold water #2 (6 ounce) cans frozen orange juice concentrate #2 (6 ounce) cans frozen pineapple juice concentrate #3 oranges, sliced into rounds #1 liter ginger ale #½ gallon orange sherbet

name: Green Punch
description: This is a green colored punch that tastes wonderful. Great for Saint Patrick's Day or whenever you feel like drinking something green!
ingredients: 2 (3 ounce) packages lime flavored Jell-O® mix #1 quart hot water #1 (46 fluid ounce) can pineapple juice #2 (12 fluid ounce) cans frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed #2 cups white sugar #4 ½ cups cold water #2 liters ginger ale

name: Hailey's Smoothie
description: A healthy drink with kiwis, bananas, blueberries and yogurt. Quick and satisfying for breakfast or any time of day!
ingredients: 3 kiwis, peeled and chopped #2 frozen bananas, peeled and chopped #1 cup blueberries #1 cup plain yogurt #1 ½ cups crushed ice #3 tablespoons honey #¼ teaspoon almond extract

name: Hot Spiked Cider
description: A 'spiked' version of the traditional hot cider - great for fall or holiday gatherings. This can be made in large quantities and kept warm in an electric coffee server.
ingredients: 1 quart water #3 orange spice tea bags #½ cup light brown sugar #2 cups apple cider #1 ½ cups light rum #8 cinnamon sticks #3 teaspoons butter

name: Italian Cream Soda
description: A watermelon and passion fruit flavored Italian cream soda.
ingredients: 8 fluid ounces carbonated water #¾ fluid ounce passion fruit flavored syrup #¾ fluid ounce watermelon flavored syrup #1 fluid ounce half-and-half cream

name: Jet Ski Jolt
description: This refreshing fruity drink is like tropical punch with a kick. A little umbrella in your glass would be a lot of fun.
ingredients: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger vodka #1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger coconut flavored rum #1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger grenadine syrup #4 fluid ounces pineapple-orange-banana juice

name: Larbo's Mango Margarita
description: This delicious fresh mango margarita is very refreshing. For an extra special twist, pour a thin layer of Grand Marnier over the top of the margarita.
ingredients: 4 fluid ounces tequila #1 fluid ounce triple sec liqueur #1 mango, peeled and seeded #2 fluid ounces water #2 cups crushed ice

name: Leftover Lemonade Solution
description: If you've ever made or bought a lemonade that was just too sour but didn't want to waste it.
ingredients: 4 ounces prepared lemonade #2 tablespoons frozen concentrated fruit punch #4 fluid ounces carbonated water

name: Lime-Pineapple Delight
description: This punch is a special occasion family punch. Great to serve on Christmas, Thanksgiving and any time.
ingredients: 8 cups crushed ice #3 (0.13 ounce) packages unsweetened lemon-lime flavored drink mix #3 cups white sugar #1 (46 fluid ounce) can pineapple juice, chilled #½ gallon lime sherbet #3 liters lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage

name: Limeade
description: A delicious and refreshing drink made with limes. Serve over ice on a hot day.
ingredients: 3 limes #⅔ cup white sugar #2 quarts cold water

name: Marie's Summer Marvel
description: A refreshing cocktail made with pink lemonade and vodka.
ingredients: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger citron vodka #2 fluid ounces pink lemonade #¼ fluid ounce lime juice #½ fluid ounce cranberry juice #1 lime, sliced

name: Melon Heaven
description: My mom is Filipino and this is a drink that she makes often during the summer. It is very delicious and a great way to cool off in the summertime.
ingredients: 1 large ripe cantaloupe #2 quarts cold water #1 large honeydew melon

name: Quick Berry Milkshake
description: This milk shake is made with MILK, not ice cream! It's refreshing and healthy!
ingredients: 4 ½ cups ice cubes #2 cups milk #⅓ cup white sugar #2 cups frozen mixed berries #1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Montana Tonic
description: A refreshing cooler on a hot day! If possible, use sun brewed tea. When raspberries are in season, squeeze 2 pints of raspberries and discard the pulp and seeds.
ingredients: 4 cups brewed black tea #1 cinnamon stick #¼ cup white sugar #1 cup raspberry juice #1 lemon, juiced #1 sprig fresh mint #1 liter carbonated water

name: My Father's Lime Daiquiri
description: My father used to make this refreshing beverage since I can remember and...let me drink it! It is a favorite of everyone in my family and of every one who has tried it!
ingredients: 3 limes, juiced #½ cup white sugar #10 fluid ounces white rum #4 maraschino cherries #6 cups ice cubes

name: Never Bitter Lemonade
description: The secret ingredient is salt, which removes any bitterness. Don't be tempted to use reconstituted lemon juice or to add the juice until the sugar water is completely chilled!
ingredients: 6 cups water #1 cup white sugar #⅛ teaspoon salt #½ cup fresh lemon juice

name: Orange Vanilla Blend
description: This is made with tofu and tastes like an Orange Julius drink. No one in your family will know they're eating tofu! Be sure to use SOFT tofu, not firm, or it will taste gritty.
ingredients: 1 frozen banana, peeled and chopped #1 (12 ounce) package soft silken tofu #2 cups orange juice #1 tablespoon honey #½ teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Party Lemonade
description: An easy to make fresh lemonade recipe for a crowd. Garnish with a fresh mint sprig and maraschino cherry.
ingredients: 12 lemons, thinly sliced #3 cups white sugar #4 trays ice cubes #8 cups cold water

name: Party Punch I
description: Yummy bubbly punch that you see at all the great baby and bridal showers! This punch looks and tastes great and doesn't really take a lot of work. Don't be afraid to experiment with different juice flavors, ice cube fruits and sherbets.
ingredients: 2 (12 fluid ounce) cans frozen concentrated grape juice #1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen concentrated fruit punch #8 liters lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage #2 lemons #½ gallon raspberry sorbet

name: Peach Drink
description: A wonderful peach flavored drink.
ingredients: 1 (11.5 ounce) can peach nectar #1 ½ cups orange juice

name: Peanut Butter and Jelly Smoothie
description: P. B. and J. in a cup! Use any flavor of jelly.
ingredients: 2 cups milk #2 tablespoons blackberry jelly #2 tablespoons peanut butter #1 bananas, frozen and chunked #2 tablespoons honey #2 teaspoons wheat germ

name: Pineapple-Orange Punch
description: Ice cream, orange sherbet, pineapple juice and ginger ale makes for a really great punch! Double this recipe for a large punch bowl.
ingredients: 1 ½ pints vanilla ice cream #1 pint orange sherbet #7 cups pineapple juice #3 cups ginger ale

name: Pineapple Delight Smoothie
description: A refreshing healthy smoothie with bananas, pineapple, milk and honey.
ingredients: 2 cups milk #2 bananas, frozen and chunked #6 pineapple rings #1 tablespoon honey

name: Pineapple Punch Drink
description: Cool and tasty - best of all easy! A definite winner.
ingredients: 2 (46 fluid ounce) cans pineapple juice #1 liter lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage #1 (4 ounce) package sweetened raspberry-flavored drink mix powder

name: Portuguese Licoro
description: This homemade liqueur recipe originates from the island of St. Michael in the Azores. It is a family favorite at Christmas time.
ingredients: 1 quart whiskey #½ lemon #4 ½ cups white sugar #1 quart milk #6 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate #2 vanilla beans

name: Pumpkin Pie Smoothie
description: Pumpkin pie in a cup!
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can solid pack pumpkin puree #1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen apple juice concentrate #⅛ teaspoon ground nutmeg #1 teaspoon ground cinnamon #2 ½ cups water

name: Adult Punch
description: Adult punch spiked with gin. Use the ice cream to make it a holiday punch or use crushed ice to make it a cool drink on hot summer days. Leave out the gin, and it is a good drink for kids at a birthday party because the ice cream cools the punch.
ingredients: 2 quarts orange juice #1 (750 milliliter) bottle gin #6 (12 fluid ounce) cans or bottles caffeinated lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage #½ gallon vanilla ice cream

name: Quenching Creamy Raspberry Punch
description: A delicious raspberry punch that goes great with chocolate. Use either vanilla ice cream or raspberry sherbet.
ingredients: 2 (64 fluid ounce) bottles raspberry cream soda, chilled #1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen concentrated raspberry juice #½ gallon vanilla ice cream

name: Really Raspberry
description: A pretty pink blender made with tofu - but don't tell anyone, and you'll be the only one who knows!
ingredients: 1 cup firm tofu #2 cups apple juice #2 cups frozen raspberries #4 tablespoons raspberry jelly #3 bananas, frozen and chunked #½ teaspoon almond extract

name: Red Rooster
description: This is a great summertime drink, lots of ice, a tall glass and a big ol' lounge chair. Mmmmmmmm!
ingredients: 1 cup ice cubes #2 fluid ounces vodka #4 fluid ounces cranberry juice #½ fluid ounce orange juice

name: Sangria II
description: This is a little different from the classic Spanish recipe, but still great! Perfect for barbeques!
ingredients: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle red wine #1 liter lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage #1 orange #2 limes #1 cup fresh pineapple - peeled, cored and chopped #1 cup cherries, pitted and halved

name: Somewhere Over the Rainbow
description: It's a cool refreshing non-alcoholic punch that's perfect for summer picnics and gatherings. Use any flavor of sherbet.
ingredients: 1 pint rainbow sherbet #2 liters lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage

name: Snow Punch
description: A tart but sweet creamy punch. I often create the mixture in step 1 and save it in the refrigerator until guests arrive.
ingredients: 6 bananas #2 cups half-and-half cream #1 cup lemon juice #1 cup white sugar #2 liters lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage #1 pint lemon sherbet

name: Soursinth
description: Great and tasteful chilled drink for the spirits, made with absinthe and sour mix.
ingredients: 2 fluid ounces absinthe #2 fluid ounces water #2 fluid ounces sour mix #2 cubes white sugar

name: Berry Shooters
description: Here's a fun and easy recipe for a summer party special! Use any flavor gelatin mix. Pour into small paper cups or ice cube trays so you can shoot 'em back in one gulp.
ingredients: 1 (3 ounce) package tropical fruit-flavored Jell-O® mix #1 cup hot water #1 cup triple berry vodka

name: Strawberry Banana Blend
description: A sweet refreshing blend of strawberries, bananas, and fresh fruit. Use any fresh fruit you choose. A healthy touch to a hot summer day.
ingredients: 2 bananas, sliced #15 strawberries, hulled #½ cup fresh peaches, pitted and chopped #1 ¾ cups strawberry sorbet #⅓ cup orange juice

name: Zebra Cake
description: This is a fun frozen treat for kids.
ingredients: 1 (9 ounce) package chocolate wafers #2 cups whipped cream

name: Syrup Sponge Pudding
description: This is an old family recipe that originates from Yorkshire England -- you can try substituting maple syrup or jam for the golden syrup.
ingredients: ½ cup margarine #½ cup white sugar #2 eggs, beaten #¼ teaspoon vanilla extract #1 ⅜ cups self-rising flour #2 tablespoons milk #4 tablespoons golden syrup

name: Apple Dumplings I
description: These Apple Dumplings are swimming in a buttery vanilla sauce. My family loves them. I hope you will, too.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can refrigerated flaky biscuit dough #4 apples - peeled, cored and halved #1 cup white sugar #1 cup water #½ cup butter, melted #2 teaspoons vanilla extract #½ teaspoon ground cinnamon

name: English Trifle to Die For
description: A traditional English trifle all children in the UK grow up eating on high days and holidays.
ingredients: 1 (9 inch) sponge cake, cut in cubes #1 cup seedless raspberry jam #8 ounces fresh raspberries #10 fluid ounces heavy cream #3 egg yolks #3 tablespoons white sugar #10 fluid ounces heavy cream #2 ounces sliced almonds

name: Famous Coconut-Almond Balls
description: Coconut and almonds dipped in chocolate.
ingredients: 4 cups flaked coconut #¼ cup light corn syrup #1 (12 ounce) package semisweet chocolate chips #¼ cup shortening #26 whole almonds

name: Apple Delight
description: For a quick-to-make excellent treat, try this yummy apple dessert that melts in your mouth.
ingredients: 2 (21 ounce) cans apple pie filling #1 (18.25 ounce) package yellow cake mix #½ cup butter, melted

name: Apple Snow
description: Fluffy and sweet, this apple treat is from the UK and goes great with ladyfingers and cream. This recipe contains raw eggs. We recommend that pregnant women, young children, the elderly and the infirm do not consume raw eggs.
ingredients: 6 large apples - peeled, cored and chopped #3 tablespoons water #1 cup white sugar #½ teaspoon ground cinnamon #¼ teaspoon ground cloves #½ teaspoon vanilla extract #1 egg white

name: Australian English Trifle
description: I got this from my mother. It's as English as you can get. Decorate with whipped cream and flaked chocolate.
ingredients: 1 (10 inch) sponge cake, cut in cubes #1 (15.25 ounce) can fruit cocktail, drained #1 (3 ounce) package port wine flavored gelatin mix #2 tablespoons custard powder #4 teaspoons white sugar #½ cup milk

name: Baked Alaska
description: Cake and ice cream dessert topped with meringue -- vary ice cream flavors for your signature dish. I like cherry-burgundy ice cream!
ingredients: 2 quarts vanilla ice cream, softened #1 (18.25 ounce) package white cake mix #1 egg #½ teaspoon almond extract #8 egg whites #⅛ teaspoon cream of tartar #⅛ teaspoon salt #1 cup white sugar

name: Baked Fudge
description: This is wonderful! It doesn't last long. My son calls it brownies!
ingredients: 2 cups white sugar #½ cup all-purpose flour #½ cup unsweetened cocoa powder #4 eggs, beaten #1 cup butter, melted #2 teaspoons vanilla extract #1 cup chopped pecans

name: Banana Boats
description: These are great for a camp fire during a trip to the outdoors. If you don't have a fire, use the oven or barbeque. Serve with hot chocolate.
ingredients: 2 bananas #¼ cup semisweet chocolate chips #¼ cup miniature marshmallows

name: Banana Pineapple Delight
description: A delicious no-bake dessert, this is the kind for any occasion that everyone loves and wants the recipe for. Vary crusts using chocolate or vanilla wafers. Garnish with nuts or cherries.
ingredients: 2 cups crushed graham crackers #½ cup margarine, melted #½ cup margarine #2 cups confectioners' sugar #2 eggs #4 tablespoons cornstarch #1 tablespoon vanilla extract #3 bananas #¼ cup lemon juice #1 (20 ounce) can crushed pineapple in heavy syrup, drained #1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed

name: Banana Pudding I
description: This is a recipe that's been handed down from my grandmother. My whole family loves it and we all grew up on it! Hope you enjoy it!
ingredients: ⅔ cup white sugar #⅓ cup all-purpose flour #¼ teaspoon salt #3 eggs, beaten #2 cups milk #½ teaspoon vanilla extract #2 tablespoons butter, softened #2 bananas, peeled and sliced #½ (12 ounce) package vanilla wafer cookies

name: Stovetop Banana Pudding
description: A mixture of eggs, milk, vanilla and a pinch of salt is heated, then stirred together with bananas and vanilla wafer cookies for a slightly crunchy, fruity pudding.
ingredients: 2 eggs #1 ½ cups milk #1 pinch salt #1 tablespoon vanilla extract #¾ cup all-purpose flour #6 bananas, peeled and sliced #1 (16 ounce) package vanilla wafer cookies #1 pinch ground nutmeg #1 pinch ground cinnamon

name: Uncooked Banana Pudding
description: Dessert in 10 minutes with vanilla pudding mix, bananas, sour cream and whipped topping.
ingredients: 8 ounces sour cream #1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed #1 (5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix #2 cups whole milk #1 (16 ounce) package vanilla wafer cookies #4 bananas, peeled and sliced

name: Berry Trifle
description: This dessert is great for parties. Its presentation is pretty, and it's even better to eat! Any combination of frozen berries may be used. Garnish with chopped nuts.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) package prepared pound cake, cubed #1 (10 ounce) package frozen blueberries #1 (10 ounce) package frozen raspberries #1 (10 ounce) package frozen blackberries #2 tablespoons praline liqueur #1 (5 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix #½ cup milk #1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk #1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed

name: Blender Chocolate Mousse
description: This is very rich and chocolaty. Garnish with whipped cream! This recipe contains raw eggs. We recommend that pregnant women, young children, the elderly and the infirm do not consume raw eggs.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) package semisweet chocolate chips #½ cup white sugar #3 eggs #1 cup hot milk (160 degrees F/71 degrees C) #3 tablespoons brandy

name: Bonbons
description: This recipe was made by my mother only around Christmas time. Now, I carry on the tradition of this sweet confection.
ingredients: 1 cup margarine, softened #2 pounds confectioners' sugar, sifted #1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk #3 cups coconut #1 cup finely chopped walnuts #1 teaspoon vanilla extract #1 (12 ounce) package semisweet chocolate chips #2 tablespoons shortening

name: Bread Pudding
description: This is one of my favorite desserts. The sauce makes the dessert! I don't use raisins, but a lot of people like to add them in.
ingredients: 3 cups bread cubes #4 cups scalded milk #¾ cup white sugar #1 tablespoon butter #½ teaspoon salt #4 eggs, lightly beaten #1 teaspoon vanilla extract #1 cup white sugar #½ cup butter #½ cup heavy cream #1 teaspoon vanilla extract

name: Broken Window Glass
description: Four colorful gelatin flavors make for an eye-catching dessert. Pour into a graham cracker crust instead of a mold for variety.
ingredients: 1 (3 ounce) package lime flavored Jell-O® mix #1 (3 ounce) package orange flavored Jell-O® mix #1 (3 ounce) package cherry flavored Jell-O® mix #4 cups boiling water #1 ½ cups cold water #1 (3 ounce) package lemon flavored Jell-O® mix #¼ cup white sugar #½ cup pineapple juice #1 (1.3 ounce) envelope whipped topping mix

name: Crispy Peanut Butter Candy Delight
description: Really delicious. Fools your palate and seems like marshmallow instead of angel food cake.
ingredients: ¼ cup butter #2 cups confectioners' sugar #2 teaspoons vanilla extract #4 egg yolks #1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed #1 (9 inch) angel food cake #6 (2.1 ounce) bars chocolate-covered crispy peanut butter flavored candy bar #½ cup pecan halves

name: Candied Citrus Peel
description: You can use the peel of orange, lemon, lime or grapefruit. This recipe can easily be doubled.
ingredients: 1 cup orange peel, cut into strips #½ cup white sugar #¼ cup water
